name: Get daily currency exchange rates from ČNB to Google sheets
description:
Make will retrieve relevant currency rates on koruna česká on schedule which you can set up yourself.
To function properly this scenario requires your Google sheet to be configured like (this)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qdRiSwidyWekPiZPwNrSdUJECWXF7I1A46XguRW3fSA/edit?usp=sharing]
